text:
Hello,
I created a hubdb table with the columns: UserID, Meeting Link.
I want to use it to add the meeting link of the deal owner in the triggered communications.

How i am expecting this to work:
Deal enrolled in workflow, if the deal owner user id matched the user id in the hubdb table, put the meeting link on the CTA.

I am using this approach as it will help me manage the team easier in case of new joiners and leavers, so we will only update the hubdb table and it will be reflected in the communication respectively.

Is this achievable? Anybody tried this previously?

Thank you!
